_newFunctionThread

public static FunctionThread _newFunctionThread(PyObject func,
                                                PyTuple args)
Initializes a FunctionThread, using the configured stack_size and registering the thread in the @link group of threads spawned by the thread module. Also used from the threading.py module.

interruptAllThreads

public static void interruptAllThreads()
Interrupts all running threads spawned by the thread module. This works in conjunction with:
  • PyTableCode.call(org.python.core.ThreadState, org.python.core.PyFrame, org.python.core.PyObject): checks for the interrupted status of the current thread and raise a SystemRestart exception if a interruption is detected.
  • FunctionThread.run(): exits the current thread when a SystemRestart exception is not caught.
    • Thus, it is possible that this doesn't make all running threads to stop, if SystemRestart exception is caught.
